about_the_game:
E-commerce Simulator 2025 Demo is a free demo version of the game where you begin your journey toward building your own digital retail empire. With the support of your uncle, you’ve come to America to chase the dream of success in e-commerce. Starting small, your goal is to learn the basics and set the foundation for your future business.

The demo version offers limited gameplay features and up to one hour of playtime, giving you a glimpse into the full e-commerce simulator 2025 experience.

A comprehensive store management interface to list your products, set pricing, manage inventory, and handle orders efficiently.

Create advertising campaigns, organize discounts and promotions, develop strategies to enhance customer loyalty.

Provide fast and reliable deliveries to customers, send products undamaged and increase customer satisfaction.

name: E-Commerce Simulator 2025 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Build your own digital retail empire and serve customers from around the globe! E-commerce Simulator 2025 Demo offers you a comprehensive virtual trading experience where you can showcase and sell various products.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
